name: Heritage: Dancing with Fireworks
description:
The Heritage Collection is RogueInfini's celebration of her ancestry. The collection is an empowering modern tribute to classic Chinese culture: from the Beijing Opera to the royal high courts of empresses and courtesans, from female warriors to folklore and mythology. The collection evokes a vibrant and curious abstraction of costumes, characters, colors, and textures, inviting you to explore deeper.

By RogueInfini
--------------------
